addOnDescription.message: PassSec+ alerts the user to enter passwords on websites where they could be compromised.
addOnDescription.description: Short description of the add-on's functionality

domainInfo.message: The site you are visiting belongs to

verifyDomain.message: Verify this information before you enter data here.

verbleibendeZeit.description: Remaining time until field is activated.

appearanceSecure.message: Appearance, if the input is secure:

appearanceNotSecure.message: Appearance, if the input is NOT secure:
appearanceNotSecure.description: Title for appearance if not secure

changeIconText.message: You can change the icon for secure input here:

iconHint.message: Note: If there were only one icon, fraudulent websites could fool you into thinking that it is safe to enter a password or other sensitive data, because the website itself would display the field with a green border and add the appropriate icon.

addRedirectionList.message: It is possible to add some redirects recommended by SECUSO. More information and a list of redirects can be found on https://www.secuso.org/passsec.

httpsRedirects.message: List of domains that are automatically redirected from http to https (secure mode)

deleteEntryWarning.message: Are you sure you want to delete the list entry?
deleteEntryWarning.description: Warn user before deleting a list entry

deleteAllEntriesWarning.message: Are you sure you want to delete all entries in the list?
deleteAllEntriesWarning.description: Warn user before deleting all list entries

userTrustedList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

userExceptionList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

lowRiskDomains.message: List of domains considered 'low risk' by developers (green frame).
lowRiskDomains.description: Activate timer on list of trusted domains.

activateLowRiskList.message: Activate list of domains the developers consider as 'low-risk'

userTrustedDomains.message: List of domains that you have classified as 'low risk' (blue frame).
userTrustedDomains.description: List of user risk domains (websites with https).

userExceptions.message: List of special cases where PassSec+ has detected an anomaly but you have decided that there is a low risk (red background)
userExceptions.description: List of user risk domains (websites with http).

userList.message: List of domains you classify as 'low risk'.

editUserList.description: Show and edit list of user risk domains.

checkExceptions20Starts.message: Check exceptions automatically after 20 browser starts.

checkExceptions20StartsTooltip.message: This check is used to keep the list of exceptions up to date.
checkExceptions20StartsTooltip.description: Tooltip for Check website exceptions after 20 starts

fieldTypes.message: Types of fields, which are taken into consideration

paymentField.message: Fields with payment information (E.g. credit card numbers)

personalField.message: Fields with further personal data (E.g. e-mail addresses)

notesOnFields.message: Note: PassSec+ makes every effort to identify and then mark the appropriate fields. Unfortunately, this is not always possible. If you notice on a web page that a field was not recognized, you are welcome to send us this web page and we will try to further develop PassSec+ accordingly.
notesOnFields.description: Text for notes on the fields

brokenHTTPS.message: Classify BROKEN HTTPS connection as safe

brokenHTTPSDescription.message: BROKEN-HTTPS means that the website is encrypted with HTTPS, but also contains elements that are not encrypted and are therefore blocked by default by the browser.

defaultSettingsWarning.message: Do you really want to restore the default settings? All stored redirects and exceptions are going to be deleted!
defaultSettingsWarning.description: Warn user before restoring default settings

savedChanges.message: Changes saved! Please reload the page on which you are using PassSec+.

defaultSettingsRestored.message: Default settings restored! Please reload the page on which you are using PassSec+.

confirmAddingHttpException.message:
Do you really want to add an exception for this website?

If you add an exception, you are no longer warned on this page, that the input of data is not safe here. Exceptions may be reset in the add-on settings.

If you nevertheless enter your data here, please check the correctness of the address in any case:
$URL$


Only enter data on this website if the address is correct. If this is not the case or you are unsure, click 'Cancel' and enter the address by hand. To continue, click 'OK'.
confirmAddingHttpException.description: Warn user before adding exception on http site

confirmAddingHttpsException.message:
Do you want to add an exception for the website
$URL$
?
confirmAddingHttpsException.description: Warn user before adding exception on https site

recommendationHttpsAvailable.message: You should always use secure mode (https). [more]

moreRecommendationHttpsAvailable.message: You should always use secure mode (https). Click on the 'secure mode' button and you will be redirected to secure mode automatically in the future‏. [less]
moreRecommendationHttpsAvailable.description: More recommendations info to use https

passwordInfoHttpsAvailable.message: More Information: The secure mode (https) protects your password from being intercepted and subsequently used to gain unauthorized access to your personal data, such as your e-mail/news, pictures, bank accounts or other sensitive information. Using secure mode (https) is particularly important when entering passwords, bank details or other sensitive information. [less]
passwordInfoHttpsAvailable.description: Info httsp: user enters login data.

passwordConsequenceHttp.message: Your password could fall into the hands of an unauthorized person and could be used to access your personal data.
passwordConsequenceHttp.description: Consequence http: user enters login data.

passwordRecommendationHttp.message: This website does not offer a secure alternative (https). If you decide to log into this website anyway and you use the same password for other website accounts, you should change them immediately.
passwordRecommendationHttp.description: Recommendation http: user enters login data.

passwordRecommendationHttpMixed.message: This website appears to be configured incorrectly: Your password will be transmitted insecurely through the internet.
passwordRecommendationHttpMixed.description: Recommendation http: user enters login data.

passwordInfoHttp.message: More Information: This website does not provide the option of entering and transmitting your password securely (via https). If you use the same password for other website accounts, and your password is intercepted by unauthorized people when you submit here, these people will gain access to your account on this webpage and also to all other websites where you use the same credentials. Therefore, it is very important to change the other website passwords immediately. [less]
passwordInfoHttp.description: Info http: user enters login data.

passwordInfoHttpMixed.message: More Information: This website does not provide the option of entering and transmitting your password securely (via https). If you use the same password for other website accounts, and your password is intercepted by unauthorized people when you submit here, these people will gain access to your account on this webpage and also to all other websites where you use the same credentials. Therefore, it is very important to change the other website passwords immediately. It is recommended to contact the website provider and inform them about the incorrect configuration. [less]
passwordInfoHttpMixed.description: Info http: user enters login data.

paymentInfoHttpsAvailable.message: More Information: The secure mode (https) protects your payment information from being intercepted and subsequently used to effect unauthorized payments. The secure mode (https) is particularly important when entering passwords, bank details or other sensitive information. [less]
paymentInfoHttpsAvailable.description: Info https: user enters payment data.

paymentConsequenceHttp.message: If you enter your payment information on this website, an unauthorized persons can intercept them. They can then use your information for payments.
paymentConsequenceHttp.description: Consequence http: user enters payment data.

paymentRecommendationHttp.message: This website does not provide a secure alternative (https). You should not enter your payment details here.
paymentRecommendationHttp.description: Recommendation http: user enters payment data.

paymentRecommendationHttpMixed.message: This website appears to be configured incorrectly: Your payment details will be transmitted insecurely through the internet.
paymentRecommendationHttpMixed.description: Recommendation http: user enters payment data.

paymentInfoHttp.message: More Information: This website provides no way to protect your payment information from interception by unauthorized persons. If your payment information is intercepted here, it can be abused at any time, e.g. for fraudulent payments on the Internet. [less]
paymentInfoHttp.description: Info http: user enters payment data.

paymentInfoHttpMixed.message: More Information: This website provides no way to protect your payment information from interception by unauthorized persons. If your payment information is intercepted here, it can be abused at any time, e.g. for fraudulent payments on the Internet. It is recommended to contact the website provider and inform them about the incorrect configuration. [less]
paymentInfoHttpMixed.description: Info http: user enters payment data.

personalInfoHttpsAvailable.message: More Information: Secure mode (https) protects your personal data from eavesdropping. Secure mode (https) is particularly important when entering passwords, bank details or other sensitive information[less].
personalInfoHttpsAvailable.description: Info https: user enters personal data.

personalConsequenceHttp.message: When you enter your personal information on this site, an unauthorized person could intercept it. This may allow conclusions to be drawn about personal matters.
personalConsequenceHttp.description: Consequence http: user enters personal data.

personalRecommendationHttp.message: This website does not provide a secure alternative (https). You should not enter any sensitive personal data here.
personalRecommendationHttp.description: Recommendation http: user enters personal data.

personalRecommendationHttpMixed.message: This website appears to be configured incorrectly: Your personal data will be transmitted insecurely through the internet.
personalRecommendationHttpMixed.description: Recommendation http: user enters personal data.

personalInfoHttp.message: More Information: This website does not provide the option of transmitting your personal data (via https). If you enter sensitive personal data here, and it is intercepted by unauthorized people, it can be abused at any time, e.g. for stealing your identity. [less]
personalInfoHttp.description: Info http: user enters personal data.

personalInfoHttpMixed.message: More Information: This website does not provide the option of transmitting your personal data (via https). If you enter sensitive personal data here, and it is intercepted by unauthorized people, it can be abused at any time, e.g. for stealing your identity. It is recommended to contact the website provider and inform them about the incorrect configuration. [less]
personalInfoHttpMixed.description: Info http: user enters personal data.

searchInfoHttpsAvailable.message: More Information: Secure mode (https) protects your search query from being intercepted. The secure mode (https) is particularly important when entering passwords, bank details or other sensitive information. [less]
searchInfoHttpsAvailable.description: Info https: user enters search queries.

searchConsequenceHttp.message: When you enter your search queries on this website, an unauthorized person could intercept it. This allows conclusions about your personal interests.
searchConsequenceHttp.description: Consequence http: user enters search queries.

searchRecommendationHttp.message: This website does not provide a secure alternative (https). Enter your search query only if it contains no sensitive data.
searchRecommendationHttp.description: Recommendation http: user enters search queries.

searchRecommendationHttpMixed.message: This website appears to be configured incorrectly: Your search queries will be transmitted insecurely through the internet.

searchInfoHttp.message: More Information: This website does not provides a way to protect your search query from interception by unauthorized persons. If your query is intercepted, this may allow them to draw conclusions about sensitive personal interests. [less]
searchInfoHttp.description: Info http: user enters search queries.

searchInfoHttpMixed.message: More Information: This website does not provides a way to protect your search query from interception by unauthorized persons. If your query is intercepted, this may allow them to draw conclusions about sensitive personal interests. It is recommended to contact the website provider and inform them about the incorrect configuration. [less]
searchInfoHttpMixed.description: Info http: user enters search queries.

defaultInfoHttpsAvailable.message: More Information:  Secure mode (https) protects your data from being intercepted. The secure mode (https) is particularly important when entering passwords, bank details or other sensitive information. [less]

defaultInfoHttpMixed.message: More Information:  Secure mode (https) protects your data from being intercepted. The secure mode (https) is particularly important when entering passwords, bank details or other sensitive information. It is recommended to contact the website provider and inform them about the incorrect configuration. [less]

defaultConsequenceHttp.message: When you enter your data on this website, an unauthorized person could intercept it.

defaultRecommendationHttp.message: This website does not provide a secure alternative (https). Enter your data only if it contains no sensitive information.

defaultRecommendationHttpMixed.message: This website appears to be configured incorrectly: Your data will be transmitted insecurely through the internet.

defaultInfoHttp.message: More Information: This website does not provides a way to protect your data from interception by unauthorized persons. If your data is intercepted here, it can be abused at any time. [less]

passwordWarning.message: It is insecure to enter a password here!
passwordWarning.description: Warn about insecurity of password field.

paymentWarning.message: It is insecure to enter payment information here!
paymentWarning.description: Warn about insecurity of payment field.

personalWarning.message: It is insecure to enter personal information here!
personalWarning.description: Warn about insecurity of personal data field.

searchWarning.message: It is insecure to enter search queries here!
searchWarning.description: Warn about insecurity of query field.

defaultWarning.message: It is insecure to enter data here!
defaultWarning.description: Warn about insecurity of input field of unknown type.
